adHeader: ARE YOU MOVING AND NEED TO HAUL YOUR STUFF? I CAN HELP YOU FOR $40!
adDetails: I HAVE a pickup truck (toyota tacoma) and an enclosed trailer 6'x12'. RAIN or SHINE, I can help you to haul your stuff. You don't have to rent a uhaul truck and pay a bunch of fees. I have a very clean truck (I don't haul any dirt or construction debris). You would get my help and my truck to load and unload your stuff, you won't pay for gas, I have ratchetable straps, tie downs, and blankets to secure your items. My rate starts at $40 for local hauling. I AM FLEXIBLE AND AN EASY GOING PERSON. All you have to do is give me a call at show contact info. My name is IGNACIO. THANKS.
